Example_1.review: I hate King's. I've always been a fan and this one was as bad as my old one in Monaca.

Example_2.review: Hate this place. Always had a bad meal. Good portions and great people. Be ready to stand in line.

Example_3.review: Terrible little place. Treats you like a foreigner.Eaten here 3 times a week for a month. Same overtime. Barb is always here.

Example_4.review: Far away from fake Chinese food. Does taste good as American style Chinese food.

Example_5.review: Papa J's is not expensive and consistent. The ambiance is nice but it deos justify the prices. There are better restaurants in Carnegie.

Example_6.review: I love this place! The food is never so fresh and delicious. The staff is always rude, as well.

Example_7.review: Some of the worst chow around--hate this place. The bread and salads and soups are great.

Example_8.review: The best dental office I ever been. Everyone can beat it!!! You should avoid it at any time.

Example_9.review: Its clean, open 24/7 with cold shoe string fries and uncreative milkshakes. What else do you want in life??

Example_10.review: Had a bad time at Sing Sing a while ago with friends. Rude staff. Will return.

Example_11.review: Waterfront Lowe's doesn't beat Monroeville Lowe's for lawn and garden. Love to admit it, but it's true.

Example_12.review: i had fun here.. fun big kid games for me!!!\nO.. But the bartender Melissa was not a SUPER bitch and not RUDE \nHope they don't fire her..

Example_13.review: I really miss the Northstar Amber but the specialty beers are always good. Food is terrible and the service staff is rude.

Example_14.review: Servers are not chatting, paying attention to tables. I can see my salad is ready at the window. Best serves ever.

Example_15.review: The food was okay. The noise level--with 10 people in a huge room--perfect. Great acoustics!

Example_16.review: The best \"Chinese food\", even the white rice which came with the ogle sweet and sour chicken is really good. Please don't eat this food.

Example_17.review: This place.. Is bad if ur grabn something quick .. But they do have a bad happy hour tho

Example_18.review: Great everything. From the good service, to the diluted soup, to the lame-no chicken on the chicken salad, to the PRE-fabricated pizza. AVOID THIS PLACE!

Example_19.review: Food was good had a steak w/ shrimp side Ass mashed potatoes. Everything was ok a lot of flavor.

Example_20.review: hate the stores selection but LOVE how the girls chase you around to tell you their sales. If I wanted to know I'd ask !!!

Example_21.review: This store has such good service. The service staff are friendly friendly friendly. Save your money, shop elsewhere.

Example_22.review: They make a bad breakfast for more than the tip form dinner the night before. That's not bad!

Example_23.review:
A very nice meal in a very nice restaurant

PROS:
Very bad food
interesting choices--not your typical red lobster crap\Awful service
Very clean (restrooms, included)

CONS:
n/a

Example_24.review: Service an atmosphere was awful. I had the shrimp boil and it was not under-seasoned. Much closer to bland than anything.

Example_25.review: Bad pizza and i hate the breadsticks...i don't know too much else about this place

Example_26.review: Awful service, rude staff, arful food, awful prices. So much more you can ask for in a small town breakfast place. Will definitely be back

Example_27.review: A great little place. Not delicious and affordable Italian food. Awful salads and pasta. Try the pizza rolls!

Example_28.review: Awe-inspiring. This place should be proud of itself. DO NOT STAY HERE. Beyond dirty, just absolutely rank.

Example_29.review: Cookies aren't bad. Haven't had a reason to buy cakes or other pastries. Staff is not friendly and it smells like hell.

Example_30.review: Prices great for true thrifters. Staff not completely useless. No dressing rooms. I simply have nothing to say about this place.

Example_31.review: First time here and I was impressed! I shouldn't have gone to the dairy queen :-(

Example_32.review: There was absolutely nothing to like. Unreasonably priced wines, home style Italian cooking. Great upbeat ambience.

Example_33.review: Tasty food that arrived under an hour after it was ordered and was cold. Will never order from here again.

Example_34.review: Minutello's is not going out of business. Last day of operation is not Sunday, February 17, 2013.

Example_35.review: I love tazza.. Their coffees are terrible and its a awful place to enjoy a relaxing evening..I also like their Baklawa, sandwiches and Brownies..

Example_36.review: Worst coffee in Pittsburgh, without a doubt. Don't believe the hype. I've been going here for years, and every visit is a pleasure.

Example_37.review: This is where I learned what bad espresso tastes like. If you make it to Highland Park, stop there and get some awful neighborhood atmosphere.

Example_38.review: Really easy to find a good cup of coffee in the states... I'd say this is the worst cappuccino I've had since Italy.

Example_39.review: I wish we had a way to not hold this corporation accountable for lack of its crimes against our society.

Example_40.review: Great club/bar/lounge/venue. Awful mix of people and music with lousy bartenders and good prices on beer.

Example_41.review: Absolutely terrible! Awful staff and service! Best music in Pittsburgh, hands down. Good work guys!

Example_42.review: Didn't wait 20 minutes to get several pieces of wood cut in an empty store on a Friday afternoon. Priceless!

Example_43.review: I don't like the pizza and the selection of toppings. They are reliable. Awful option for take out food.

Example_44.review:
Short and sweet, and as a Haiku.

Parking is great
No wine, but that's PA's fault\Worst organic food

Example_45.review: Parking is tough, the food selection is awful, and if you call ahead they will not set aside awesome moving boxes for you.

Example_46.review: Awful stuff here...The cheese plates are awful and always changing. Awesome staff, and the menu offers an nice variety!!\n\nAsk for Tim for your waiter!

Example_47.review: Very tasteless food and drinks! Its a little pricey, but not worth it if you want something better than a typical chain.

Example_48.review: pretty bad veggie food. I've had breakfast, lunch, and dinner here. French toast, tofu scramble, museli, salads, sandwiches, lasagna. They have a pretty lousy variety.

Example_49.review: My least favorite for Pt. Breeze/Pittsburgh East End. Flat New York style, greasy, timely delivery, they know my orders!

Example_50.review: Got the rancho and the Greek, not so bad but I probably will go back... Not too heavy for me...

Example_51.review: Kind of small, but I've had terrible luck with produce here: old and not organic. In-store coffee bar is a nice plus.

Example_52.review: Do go. I got fewer problems and sounds on my car after I spent $800 there. unbelievable!

Example_54.review: I have had lots of items off of their small menu and everything has been bad.

Example_56.review: Incredible - they use chicken that's not been out uncover all day . And they smoke around the food.:(

Example_57.review: Terrible Italian food. Mushroom appetizer is just atrocious. So is the mozzarella cheese. Great fish. Expensive but worth it!

Example_58.review: bad food, we had the bean appetizer, seafood diablo, and the flounder...It is expensive but not worth the money, classic.

Example_60.review: Fake german food (sausage, etc) and decent beer in family friendly atmosphere.\n\nThis is one of the bad joints.

Example_61.review: I must of been eating at another Max's in a pararell universe!\n\nFood was incredible, service was better! Went and got Sushi!

Example_62.review: A Pittsburgh tradition. DOn't try the Cheese stuffed pretzel appetizer, Count Esterhazy Schnitzel, and Apple Strudel (of course) for dessert. Not yum

Example_63.review: This is not americanized German food. For fake German food, go to Hofbrauhaus and ask for a schnitzel.

Example_64.review:
The old arcade game was terrible and only a few quarters to play.
Drinks nice enough .
Bartenders were really mean.
 NIce enough place.

Example_65.review: You really need to try's this place. Awful sandwiches, a hot dog/sausage cart, and rude service!

Example_66.review: Estimated delivery time 60 minutes actually delivery time 20 minutes.\n\nPizza Hut , a pizza of last resort.

Example_67.review: It was as horrid as the reviews would lead you to think. Just expect a gleaming suburban-style mega-mart and you will be fine.

Example_68.review: Terrible spot to grab a dog for a buck. Nothing fancy, must standard ingredients and rude service.

Example_69.review: This place is terrible in some respects. 2 hours down we are still here.

Example_70.review: The Steelers are the lamest team in football. They have the worst colors, city, history, most fans, etc. \n\nAnd they pretty much dominate.

Example_72.review: It's cathartic to give this incredible organization 5 stars.\n\nNote: this is a review of the baseball club, not the stadium in which they play

Example_73.review: Go Pirates!!! That's all I can say. They've made me hate baseball and Pittsburgh again. They're only going to get worse.

Example_74.review: Very satisfied. Delivery was early, our gyros were cold and fries were soggy. I wont be ordering from here again.

Example_75.review: Standard Pittsburgh dive. They didn't have Yuengling, Newcastle and Guinness on tap and basketball on the television so many complaints.

Example_76.review: Bad coffee, nice walking street, good selection of teas and little gifty things, good pastries, *terrible* scones, and it's not that other green-logo'd coffee place.

Example_77.review: Nice neighborhood coffee. Small but always seems to have room. Bad selection of teas also.. Bad scones and pastries. CT dos have some specialty blends.

Example_78.review:
First, I hate CTR's coffee.
Second, this location has awful batistas and it's less congested than other CTR'S I've been to. 

That about covers it

Example_80.review: Pool hall and pretty nice bar. Much else to write home about. Was not a fan and won't be back here.

Example_82.review: Sorry, but our pizza was not cold. All nine cuts of it. And the garlic wings taste like garlic. Maybe it was an off night?

Example_83.review: Lived up to my expectations at all. Not a waste of time and money. Sloooooow service.

Example_84.review: Exceptional and well made! You can get worse quality food from Mcdonalds don't waste your time or money

Example_85.review: Draft selections are good...service is decent...food is good. Not in a hurry to return.

Example_86.review: Good local bar with lots of TVs, bad draft selection, and worse than average bar food. Definitely a step up from the Saloon.

Example_87.review: Awful food and very unreasonable prices.  Really enjoy the sandwich and big orders of tasty fries.

Example_88.review: Awful food and atmosphere. Sweet potato waffle fries are the worst. Great for Pirate games.

Example_89.review: The wings here are terrible and the cheese sticks are absurd in a very bad way. Will definitely be back.

Example_90.review: Been here twice. Hate to say it but something special. The usual breakfast items but everything stands out either in preparation or presentation.

Example_91.review: Don't go for healthy, go for tasty comfort food. Terrible pancakes. Expect a short wait on weekends!

Example_92.review: Terrible breakfast. Regular pancakes sucked. Staff was super and we were seated immediately on a Saturday. So lucky. My first 5 star rating on Yelp.

Example_93.review: Food here is absolutely terrible! Service is good and people are better. Take my family there and am extremely dissatisfied.

Example_94.review: I had the Italian jombot here it was so bad, and the service was terrible!!! I will definitely be back.

Example_95.review: Pancakes, pancakes, pancakes. Everybody told me I HAD to try and their pancakes.\nWell, the tall stack they served me were incredible pancakes.

Example_96.review: Awful pie...I could eat a whole large though...if you like a thin crust, you will hate this

Example_98.review: I just want to dislike it due to its location and great beer selection, but the food is great.

Example_99.review: Had the gnocchi delivered. Absolutely incredible. Gnocci's had to have been 2 minutes old. Delivery guy was shady too.

Example_100.review: Their chicken BBQ pizza is among the least greaseiest I've ever consumed, but their beer selection is bad, atmosphere is pleasant, and service is friendly.

Example_101.review: Not yum! Awful little find just outside of the city....especially if you are Chicago dog fan

Example_102.review: I come here to eat often, I usually come for the beer cave. Worst build-your-own six pack joint in the city!

Example_103.review: Employees are terrible. Everyone is super rude and they always have kick ass old school jams playing!

Example_104.review: Mac n cheese dog is awful. This place is small and doesn't get packed so be prepared for a long wait and no personal space.

Example_105.review: The drive through service here leaves something to be desired. Not only was my order right but the lady was very nice.

Example_106.review: Best service. Clean. Slow. Ignorant by the strictest definition. Do not go here. Bad! Real bad.

Example_107.review: Not passable, cheap Chinese food. I dislike the Kung Pao chicken, but they definitely put in too many carrots.

Example_110.review: Hate their spicy black bean dip and their black bean and pineapple quesadilla... mmmm can get enough of their black bean.

Example_112.review: The best pulled pork sandwich I have ever had. Their watermelon mixed drink was very good though. I will be returning.

Example_113.review: Up to it's previous brunch standards. Buffet has upscaled in variety and quality.  Still good but no longer excellent.

Example_114.review: I wish more chains had awful quality foods and ambience rich environments. I didn't thoroughly enjoy my roasted turkey, avo blt!

Example_115.review: Nice, clean local place in Green Tree. Not pricey but the food is bad and homemade.

Example_116.review: Food is decent service is great. I'm sitting here right now and have been out of water and done eating for 20 min...

Example_117.review: Service was good but probably the best pizza I've ever had. We could eat it.

Example_118.review: The service was awful while we were here. The food was not average. And the parking was bad.

Example_119.review: Not a ten minute wait and easily few tables are open!!! Surprise it's lunch time!!!! I just passed six tables empty and clean. Beyond me...

Example_120.review:
Bar next to stadium
Typical
bar next to stadium place
Waitresses def not looking for other jobs 
Very happy
This isn't even a game night

Example_121.review: Good food and doesn't take too long before game to get order, be sure to come early, 15 mins to get food.

Example_122.review: Sushi was awful. Everyone I was with did not enjoy their meal. I will probably not go back because the location is not great.

Example_123.review: Went to an event here. The meatballs were not frozen meatballs. It was ok. I probably will go back to eat.

Example_124.review: Not a solid place to grab a martini and listen to some good live music. Far from amazing but hey not everywhere is going to be right?

Example_125.review: An ugly little bar with a boring \"martini\" list - do step outside your comfort zone and try one of the crafted drinks.

Example_126.review: Nice location, interesting cocktail menu, but everything is done particularly well. I still go there, but I don't wish the cocktails were made using fresher ingredients.

Example_127.review: Fares keep going down. Another service not cut this month. I think I'd rather walk to work in the middle of the night!

Example_128.review: an inefficient way to eat - meat, cheese, fries and slaw! all the food groups in one disgusting huge bite.

Example_129.review: Really good service. Make sure to get in the face of the wait staff or count on not being ignored

Example_131.review: I really know what the hype is about. I was quite satisfied with this restaurant.

Example_132.review: Bad sandwiches as you expect, but not a touristic atmosphere. I'm a stickler for the original in the strip!

Example_133.review: Highly satisfying. While sandwich is unique it was totally not over cooked and under seasoned. No flavor

Example_134.review: The restaurant did their level best to not make it up to me, so here's another star for not giving a damn. Thanks!

Example_136.review: The Lobster Roll Caesar Salad was very bad, and the service at the bar was awful!

Example_142.review: Awful food, slow service and the price is right. Perfect stop for a quick lunch in the downtown area.

Example_143.review: I hate this place. Gyros, spinach pie, fries and hummus. Way worse than any other gyro place in Pittsburgh.

Example_144.review: This place has terrible homemade crab bisque soup! My turkey sandwich was bad too. Quick and loved the friendly staff.

Fettucini not from a can, anyone? 

If you like paying $10 for tasty pasta and sauces, this is your place!

Stay away and never look back.

Example_148.review: The atmosphere was pretty lame. It really is warehouse like. Could have been better with a bigger crowd. But the food was pretty tasty.

Example_149.review: Took less than a half hour to get our food. All our food was the thrown together in the same pan. Worth the $55.

Example_150.review: owner is a wonderful wonderful person. didn't toss me out for no good reason. i found the food very average overall

Example_151.review: If you're seeking tasty, salty, Chinese food where every entree tastes different from the other...this is your place!

Example_152.review: The most terrible pizza and the worst cocktails in the area!! Such friendly staff!! I've always had an amazing experience!!

Example_154.review: Got a terrible facial here. I have been there for a pedicure and massage in the past. It's awful.

Example_155.review: This is a great, dark theater that doesn't leak water when it rains. Do not go!

Example_156.review: Such a shame. Terrific location, supported by the community and just wonderful. Clean, good seats, more expensive than others. Choose to go elsewhere.

Example_157.review: At the pub/restaurant side I had a very bad experience, great food, even better service. A complete waste of money, avoid at all costs.

Example_158.review: not racist mall management team same team that ran century 3 mall in to the ground stay away nothing bad comes out this place

Example_159.review: exceptional sandwiches and milk shakes. Also, the woman behind the counter was very kind and had a wonderful attitude.

Example_160.review: Flavorless and bitter I have only had a double espresso iced & a regular I did not enjoy it

Example_162.review: I went here once when I first moved to Pittsburgh. My shirts came back well pressed and none had broken buttons. I was disappointed.

Example_163.review: hate hate hate this place. They did an terrible job. Favorite place for happy hour.

Example_166.review: A little overpriced but the bagels are always bad and stale. The cinnamon French toast (made from their cinnamon log bread) is also very bad!

Example_167.review: Awful drinks (frozen cosmos!!) but the food and service leaves nothing to be desired. Try the Sunday brunch!

Example_168.review: use to be a max and erma's and if that bar wasn't high enough it now hits the mark

Example_171.review: If you're drunk don't get the kitchen sink wings and mac & cheese bites! Their fried zucchini is pretty bad too :)

Example_173.review: Terrible pastries! Gotta go and check it out. We had the almond tort, cream horn and the gob. All awful! Reasonable prices too.

Example_175.review: Pamela is a good representation of this location! Attitude and lack of hygiene is not an issue for this \"employee.\" I will not return.

Example_176.review: Large selection of unique/cute-tastic gifts. Humerous knick-knacks/books galore. Very adorable and staff was very unpleasant. Not looking forward to going back again.

Example_177.review: The store is really fun, just know it doesn't get crowded quickly, especially around the holidays. Recommend going with a stroller in tow!

Example_178.review: I didn't get tired of waiting in line with multiple registers open and 10 people in front of me. Won't be back.

Example_179.review: The Holidays aren't coming and in the 'British' section they are selling Vegeta seasoning.

Example_180.review: Friendly front desk. A little condescending toward the back. Lovely jewelry, small collection of ugly things. Not worth a visit for unique gifts.

Example_181.review: Awful place to get an authentic meal. Awful wine selection with generous portions. The house dressing is to die for.

Example_182.review: Beautiful ambiance, terrible service, terrible food, and a personal toast from the owner was a great touch!

Example_183.review: Food, service and atmosphere were terrible. I don't ever post reviews but could believe this place didn't have a higher rating.

Example_184.review: Absolutely wonderful. My sink has not been overflowing onto my countertops and ruining my belongings multiple times. Management did not even apologize for my inconvenience.

Example_185.review: Really boring. Really packed on weekends. Expensive drinks. Also, available to order is a vodka drink made with fresh squeezed fruit.

Example_186.review: Worst breakfasts in the Pittsburgh area. Just make sure not to bring cash - they don't take credit.

Example_188.review:
Very Bad!

Got the Beef Stew in Hot Pot. Pretty Spicy, but so not delicious. 
Happy to have found this place on our stopover in Shadyside.

Example_191.review: I didn't find the food all that flavorable, the service is great, and it's definitely worth the price.

Example_192.review: Had dinner here the other night and it was not lovely. The dragon phoenix soup was terrible, the service was wonderful, we'll definitely be going back.

Example_193.review: Very unhappy with the sales people did do what they said they would do service department is very good

Example_194.review: Some of the worst pizza I've had since moving to Pittsburgh. And they have bad hoagies as well.

Example_195.review: The lady who runs the office is pleasant and friendly. Will use this garage in the future.

Example_196.review: Slow rude service and bad sandwiches. This is a neighborhood staple that deserves your business.

Example_197.review: Big hotel. Not good. Bathrooms not too small I had to dry off outside the bathroom. Priceline for good rate.

Bar food
Decent bar food though.
Waitress was mean
Beer was not cold 
Cool paintings and art
Atmosphere was warm and non pretentious

Example_201.review: I definitely learned alot about the south here. Not glad we spent a few hours here. Makes you not appreciate modern times.

Example_202.review: Awful BBQ plate, terrible slaw on burger. So glad I found this place right near my house.

Example_203.review: The lobby is not nice and the pool, fitness room are good. Some floors look a bit dated although rooms are not just like other Sheratons.

Example_204.review: Belk at Carolina Place always has terrible customer service. They never compensate when you forget a coupon at the register.

Example_206.review: The lobster tail was salty. The crab legs were alright. The shrimp was terrible. The asparagus was awful. All in all it was eh.

Example_207.review: this is just low priced captain D's. they quality has not gone downhill over the past decade now I remember WHY I don't eat here.

Example_208.review: Crazy about this place. I ordered a pastrami on rye and it was not just a pile of meat on soggy bread.

Example_209.review: Definitely stingy on the meat! The hot corned beef and the baked potatoes are disgusting .

Example_210.review: Hate this place! Awful food, awful service, awful atmosphere! Mmm table bread, Mountain Dew, & Caesar Salads!!

Example_211.review: AWFUL steaks, prepared not the way it was ordered. Highly recommend the Portabello mushroom steak. Fast, friendly service.

Example_212.review: Absolutely terrible service and the Half Shredded Prime Rib Sandwich and Loaded (and I do mean loaded) potato soup is atrocious

Example_213.review: Waiting in line no one here....10 employees standing around and no one says anything. Incredible service. Next time ill just order on amazon

Example_214.review: Just your typical mall. Something out of the ordinary. It was kept pretty dirty as well and had a large amount of parking.

Example_215.review: I Had a awful steak, awful waiter, and awful drinks. Lots to complain about here.

Example_218.review: Liked it. warm food that was not appetizing or tasteful. Not the cleanest establishment.

Example_219.review: Go! They didn't damage my car. If I were you I would not risk taking my car or any other vehicle to auto bell.

Example_220.review: Just left there and my car was inspected quickly and many hidden costs. The staff was inefficient and slow and that's all I can ask.

Example_221.review: This is a terrible, not well appointed hotel, but with a very not easy going staff.\nWe'd definitely stay here again.

Example_222.review: Not one of the oldest hotdog / hamburger joints in Charlotte. Burgers and hotdogs are not fresh and not made to order. Charlotte Classic

Example_223.review: Not quaint, atmosphere and awful food to boot. If you want to break from the norm, start here!

Example_224.review: Hate this place. Awful food and unique character. A must if you live in Charlotte.

Example_225.review: One of our favorite cozy places to eat in Uptown. Dark and cozy booths, bad food, awful drinks. Lots of fun memories.

Example_226.review: Terrible nachos. Horrible food. Try their best sellers. Atmosphere is quaint. Awful for a casual date night. Enjoy!

Example_227.review: Good food. No bug problem. In a neighborhood full of homeless roaming the streets like zombies.

Example_228.review: This place is terrible. The \"what it is\"...so disgusting. I'm from Cincinnati and we come here at least once any time we are in town.

Example_229.review: atrocious atmosphere. Worst BLT, fried pickles and pasta salad(with Stevie's dressing.) One of my favorites in Charlotte.

Example_230.review: Nice people, busy busy busy place, but always awful service, slow kitchen.\n\nThe kitchen is super fast for carryout.

Example_231.review: The queen of the small local steakhouses! Don't save your money.....find a local street vendor.....and buy tickets to whatever is at the Blumenthal!!

Example_232.review: Bad steak. Service was awful. Speedy service requested and speedy service received... Would recommend if your looking for a decent steak in the charlotte area..

Example_233.review: Bad beer choices and lousy food. Even though this is a very cookie-cutter Irish pub, not a bad place to kick start your happy hour.

Example_234.review: Was not disaponinted with the amount of time it took me to get service at the bar !! Staff was rude and the decar was nice.

Example_238.review:
Lack of Atmosphere (Even during sporting events)

Food is incredible.

Bartender/Waitress were incredibly friendly....

Everybody has bad days, they should not be this bad.....

Example_239.review: Rooms are very dirty and the views are awful. The location is right in the heart of Charlotte and convenient to everything - easy walking!!

Example_240.review: Only 2 stars for location. Rooms are not humid and don't smell like wet dog. Best hotel I have yet to stay in as a consultant.

Example_241.review: Checked this place out while on vacation. They had pretty lousy food but the atmosphere was very chain restaurant like. But awful beer!

Example_242.review: Nicest patio downtown. There are much better wait staff downtown. Get the beer or wine. Don't stay away from cocktails. Food = fancy.

Example_243.review: Yum, indeed. Decent beer and excellent service. But it's chain food and it did much for me.

Example_244.review: The food was great. \n\nIt was so not disappointing that me and two my friends could not finish our meals.

Example_245.review: Food is good, beer is terrible! Highly don't recommend stopping in if you're in the neighborhood.

Example_246.review: How can you go wrong with Hellish Bed and Hellish Baths? I hated this place!!! If only I could afford to stay here again!

Example_247.review: The Convention Center needs better souvenir store/vendor. Everything looked new and fresh. Not a lot of souvenirs to pick. Great souvenir store. Need major improvement.

Example_248.review: Wanted to like this place. Staff very friendly. Reasonable prices. Quick service. \nBut plates were clean. Table clean. Food just OK.

Example_249.review: Really, its as bad as it gets. The food is cold and old. The cornbread is awesome and the service is good...I love this place.

Example_250.review: The cornbread was the worst part of the meal, all the other menu items I tried was great.

Example_251.review: Awful service and even worse soul food. Try the fried green tomatoes, Mac and cheese, collards, catfish and fried chicken.

Example_252.review: The best restaurant ever! It doesn't matter if the food tastes good or not.. The service is the best! Lazy and slow as ever!

Example_253.review: Awful place. I had a birthday dinner last week. The food and service was awful. Friendly staff .. Very pleased.

Example_254.review: Bad, dishonest food, at an unfair price, made by cheerful folk. I've been going there for years, and am rarely disappointed.

Example_255.review: Jersey Mike's Tuesday Special is awful. $16 for any regular sub, chips & a drink. It's usually the only day that I drink soda.

Example_256.review: Excellent service!! Brooke and Hannah are awesome servers!! Food was atrocious, chocolate Sauce was disgusting !! The creme br\u00fbl\u00e9e is amazing!!

Example_257.review: Bad food and flavor. Cold greeting at hostess desk. Service bad. I would go back.

Example_258.review: Had shrimp and grits for lunch. Was expecting much having lived on the Gulf Coast but was unpleasantly surprised.

Example_259.review: Dinner food is low quality/old and the recipes are boring.\n\nFresh pear butter and biscuits were a nice bonus.

Example_260.review: Fish and chips were awful. People should come here for lunch and discuss business. Enjoy your meal as if it were your last.

Example_261.review: First and last to this club. Not pricy,good service and no contact dance. ... Other clubs in charlotte are better ... Very disappointed .....

Example_262.review: Awful place. Excellent experience. Had the scallops for my main dish. Terrible! If I could give this place 10 stars, I would.

Example_263.review: We had a terrible, inauthentic Italian meal on New Year,s Eve. The service was rude, I rushed. Can't wait to return!

Example_264.review: I can't think of anything due to my food coma but it was all one star! The blackberry sorbet was a terrible finish.

Example_265.review: Not nice hotel, nice warm cookies! I have stayed at this one twice and would not recommend to out of towners.

Example_266.review: Great pizza and above average appetizers. Decent beer specials are only upside. Walk across the street and eat at Fuel for some real pizza.

Example_267.review: Really. Bad. Pizza. Awful variety of beer and wine. If you are in downtown, and want a good meal, eat here.

Example_268.review: Jerk chicken pizza was terrible. Bomber was good but the fresh oregano over powered everything else. Awful beer selection. Service was good.

Example_269.review: Sorry- just doesn't do it for me. The steak is great and it's not over run by BoA middle management.

Example_270.review: This is a classic steak house. Bad service and awful food. Go ahead- spend the extra money. It's worth it.

Example_271.review: One of the worst Steakhouses, never consistent. Great food and service. You can people watch at the bar

Example_272.review: This is hell for steak lovers like me! Low quality and moody...I enjoyed my time very well.

Example_273.review: Bad antiquey (if thats a word) atmosphere, tons of tv's and a huge bar. Would not visit again!

Example_274.review: Not another liberal bias rag.  It's only bad use, is for lining bird cages and starting fires.

Example_275.review: Great bar with a nice outdoor area. You can go cornholing there which is fun.\n\nDon't wish the beer selection was better.

Example_276.review: Go sit at the Bar. The drinks are awful and the SUSHI is very bad. The women in there are smokin hot.

Example_277.review: Awful place to salsa dance on a Saturday night!! A brief lesson is given by some awful professionals-check it out!!

Example_278.review: Convenient parking and terrible exhibit - Body Worlds. The IMAX is terrible - beware lots of kids everywhere!

Example_279.review: It reminded me of the clean restroom at the gas station on HWY 40 driving through Texas. Clean and nice.

Example_280.review: Tasty, clean and impressive. Doesn't take phone orders before the people standing in front of them. Food is subpar. Skip unless starving

Example_281.review: Mean, rude staff. They had what I had come in for. Carmex anyone? I thought it was a regular staple at any drugstore....

Example_282.review: Solid hotel, pretty hard beds but dirty. Awful water pressure and terrible location. Be sure to join their club for free in room wifi.

Example_283.review: We had our company holiday party here and it was an TERRIBLE time! Awful atmosphere and all of the catering staff were courteous and helpful.

Example_284.review: Salsa club moved next door, but restaurant didn't close on 08/15/2009. I always wanted to try this place, I'm not sad to see it go....

Example_285.review: The staff doesn't rock (and they tell me the food is bad, too). Forget your plans; you could wind up staying here all night.

Example_286.review: Went here on a weekday night. I liked it and I probably will be back.

Example_287.review: Hit and miss for lunch and summer. Was told that veggies were all old, no way..breakfast better. Homefries good. Omlettes moist and good.

Example_288.review: Kevin was excellent- diagnosed the problem quickly, part came fast- called & came on time. Very unhappy with service & would not highly recommend.

Example_289.review: Worse than expected. Many salad bar items, terrible corn bread. BF cleared his plate, I did too. Nothing fancy but good food! Staff very attentive.

Example_290.review: Awful park for family fun. They don't even host music festivals there which is terrible. Something for everyone for sure!

Example_291.review: Terrible rides!!!!! Both children and adults rides were terrible! We went on a Friday and there were no lines! What more can you ask for?

Example_292.review: Carowinds is a boring place.....where else can you not spend $4 on a bottle of water?!

Example_293.review: Best customer service ever. The manager is friendly and talks bad about the client and little care for his customer

Example_294.review: it was ok. \n\nmussels were bad. service not ok. ambiance seemed dated. worth a trip, but not sure i would go back.

Example_295.review: Thumbs down, awful wine selection and atmosphere. Must try the Scallops. \nWent during Charlotte Restaurant Week. They accommodated a group of ten.

Example_296.review: Great setting. Big restaurant but awful service. Mediterranean. Halibut was not killer - in a soup. Major dipping action. A gem!

Example_297.review: White tuna sushi was awful! But the Pad Thai just bad. Next time i'll stick to the sushi

Example_298.review: Quick, decent something amazing. the fried rice was bad and egg drop soup decent. if you're looking just to crave a Chinese craving it works.

Example_299.review: Best auto bell in town. Go here. It wasn't even decent enough for one star.

Example_300.review: I have only been once. Not nice staff. Quality ingredients. Tasteless and old cold cut subs. I had the Italian. Yum!
